item.title: France TV Distribution Heads to Le Havre Rendez-Vous With Historical Drama ‘Unchained’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: France TV Distribution, the sales arm of French public broadcaster France Télévisions, has boarded the period slave drama “Unchained,” which it is launching internationally at this year’s Unifrance Re
